11#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/include/remote_ntp_time_estimator.h"
12
13#include <cstdint>
14
15#include "modules/rtp_rtcp/source/time_util.h"
16#include "rtc_base/logging.h"
17#include "system_wrappers/include/clock.h"
18#include "system_wrappers/include/ntp_time.h"
19
20namespace webrtc {
21
22namespace {
23
24constexpr int kMinimumNumberOfSamples = 2;
25constexpr int kTimingLogIntervalMs = 10000;
26constexpr int kClocksOffsetSmoothingWindow = 100;
27
28} // namespace
29
30// TODO(wu): Refactor this class so that it can be shared with
31// vie_sync_module.cc.
32RemoteNtpTimeEstimator::RemoteNtpTimeEstimator(Clock* clock)
33 : clock_(clock),
34 ntp_clocks_offset_estimator_(kClocksOffsetSmoothingWindow),
35 last_timing_log_ms_(-1) {}
36
37RemoteNtpTimeEstimator::~RemoteNtpTimeEstimator() {}
38
39bool RemoteNtpTimeEstimator::UpdateRtcpTimestamp(int64_t rtt,
40 uint32_t ntp_secs,
41 uint32_t ntp_frac,
42 uint32_t rtp_timestamp) {
43 bool new_rtcp_sr = false;
44 if (!rtp_to_ntp_.UpdateMeasurements(ntp_secs, ntp_frac, rtp_timestamp,
45 &new_rtcp_sr)) {
46 return false;
47 }
48 if (!new_rtcp_sr) {
49 // No new RTCP SR since last time this function was called.
50 return true;
51 }
52
53 // Update extrapolator with the new arrival time.
54 // The extrapolator assumes the ntp time.
55 int64_t receiver_arrival_time_ms = clock_->CurrentNtpInMilliseconds();
56 int64_t sender_send_time_ms = NtpTime(ntp_secs, ntp_frac).ToMs();
57 int64_t sender_arrival_time_ms = sender_send_time_ms + rtt / 2;
58 int64_t remote_to_local_clocks_offset =
59 receiver_arrival_time_ms - sender_arrival_time_ms;
60 ntp_clocks_offset_estimator_.Insert(remote_to_local_clocks_offset);
61 return true;
62}
63
64int64_t RemoteNtpTimeEstimator::Estimate(uint32_t rtp_timestamp) {
65 int64_t sender_capture_ntp_ms = 0;
66 if (!rtp_to_ntp_.Estimate(rtp_timestamp, &sender_capture_ntp_ms)) {
67 return -1;
68 }
69
70 int64_t remote_to_local_clocks_offset =
71 ntp_clocks_offset_estimator_.GetFilteredValue();
72 int64_t receiver_capture_ntp_ms =
73 sender_capture_ntp_ms + remote_to_local_clocks_offset;
74
75 int64_t now_ms = clock_->TimeInMilliseconds();
76 if (now_ms - last_timing_log_ms_ > kTimingLogIntervalMs) {
77 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "RTP timestamp: " << rtp_timestamp
78 << " in NTP clock: " << sender_capture_ntp_ms
79 << " estimated time in receiver NTP clock: "
80 << receiver_capture_ntp_ms;
81 last_timing_log_ms_ = now_ms;
82 }
83
84 return receiver_capture_ntp_ms;
85}
86
87absl::optional<int64_t>
88RemoteNtpTimeEstimator::EstimateRemoteToLocalClockOffsetMs() {
89 if (ntp_clocks_offset_estimator_.GetNumberOfSamplesStored() <
90 kMinimumNumberOfSamples) {
91 return absl::nullopt;
92 }
93 return ntp_clocks_offset_estimator_.GetFilteredValue();
94}
95
96} // namespace webrtc
